mapper.sql: id, lsh, mrm_member_id, cim_item_id, quantity, once_contain_quantity, residue_quantity, seller_id, creation_date

distinct
from dwt_perform_item
order by ${orderByClause}

id,
lsh,
mrm_member_id,
cim_item_id,
quantity,

residue_quantity,

update dwt_perform_item
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lsh = #{record.lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mrm_member_id = #{record.mrmMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cim_item_id = #{record.cimItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update dwt_perform_item set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lsh = #{record.lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mrm_member_id = #{record.mrmMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cim_item_id = #{record.cimItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{record.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, once_contain_quantity = #{record.onceContainQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, residue_quantity = #{record.residueQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seller_id = #{record.sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creation_date = #{record.creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update dwt_perform_item
lsh = #{lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mrm_member_id = #{mrmMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cim_item_id = #{cimItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
once_contain_quantity = #{onceContainQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
residue_quantity = #{residueQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dwt_perform_item set lsh = #{lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mrm_member_id = #{mrmMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cim_item_id = #{cimItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, once_contain_quantity = #{onceContainQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, residue_quantity = #{residueQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into dwt_perform_item ( id, lsh, mrm_member_id, cim_item_id, quantity, once_contain_quantity, residue_quantity, seller_id, creation_date) values
( #{performItem.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{performItem.lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{performItem.mrmMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{performItem.cimItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{performItem.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{performItem.onceContainQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{performItem.residueQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{performItem.sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{performItem.creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update.foreach: update dwt_perform_item set residue_quantity = residue_quantity - (#{performItem.residueQuantity} * once_contain_quantity) where cim_item_id = #{performItem.cimItemId} and lsh = #{performItem.lsh}
update dwt_perform_item set residue_quantity = 0 where cim_item_id = #{performItem.cimItemId} and lsh = #{performItem.lsh}

mapper.select:
select * from view_dwt_perform_item
(residueQuantity > 0) and
(mrmMemberId = #{mrmMemberId}) and
(cimItemName like '${cimItemName}%' or cimItemCode like '${cimItemName}%') and
